document_data.name: Hemjax Tefoco
document_data.siblings: [[Bubbles Tefoco]], [[Thegglis Tefoco]], [[Maggie Tefoco]], [[Crowell Tefoco]], [[Dariel Tefoco]], [[Blunce Tetoco]], [[Harvel Tefoco]] others
document_data.mainbody: '''Hemjax Tefoco''' was the youngest child of [[Oliver Tefoco]], the proprietor of the [[Beehive Goods and Wares]] general store in the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: Hemjax was a child of Oliver and [[Kroyce Tefoco]], and had a number of siblings. The oldest of them was [[Bubbles Tefoco]], who lived in the [[Stonyeyes]] district of the Gate with her family and the newborn [[Dorimara]]. Another older sibling was [[Dariel Tefoco]] who served the [[Flaming Fist]]. [[Thegglis Tefoco|Thegglis]] and [[Crowell Tefoco|Crowell]] were traveling caravan guards, while the youngest of the bunch, [[Maggie Tefoco|Maggie]] and others, still lived with Oliver and Kroyce as of the late 15{{th}} century DR.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, as the [[Cult of the Absolute]] threatened Baldur's Gate's safety, Kroyce Tefoco took Hemjax, Maggie, and other youngest kids to the town of [[Beregost]], to live with Uncle [[Sternwell]], away from the threat of war. Oliver left behind to run the shop, to Kroyce's dismay. Hemjax and the family were given Uncle Sternwell's shearing shed to live in.
